channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky says he went to ‘night school’ for an hour every day with Barack Obama and even turned in homework
item.description: The billionaire founder admits a weekly mentorship call with the former president came with assignments like being more intentional with his friendshi...

item.title: Massive Medicaid fraud scheme puts Minnesota’s federal funding at risk — and fallout could widen
item.description: Minnesota faces potential federal Medicaid funding cuts over alleged fraud schemes, amid multiple ongoing investigations into the matter.

item.title: Meetings are not work, says Southwest Airlines CEO—and he’s taking action, by blocking his calendar every afternoon from Wednesday to Friday
item.description: Southwest Airlines CEO Bob Jordan says too many execs mistake packed calendars for productivity. He’s found a ‘crazy’ solution.

item.title: What will Virginia's Republican Gov. Glenn Youngkin do next? He's not ready to tell
item.description: Almost from the moment that Glenn Youngkin became Virginia's governor four years ago, the political world has wondered what's next for a Republican wh...

item.title: Bittensor, the AI-linked cryptocurrency founded by a former Google engineer, just halved its supply. Here’s what that means
item.description: The mechanics of Bittensor mirror those of Bitcoin, the world’s largest cryptocurrency.

item.title: The Indiana Redistricting Fail Is A Lot More Complicated Than Pro-Trump Vs. Anti-Trump

item.title: Rep. Ilhan Omar says her son was pulled over by ICE
item.description: Somalia-born Rep. Ilhan Omar said that her son was pulled over by Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents and asked to provide proof of citizenship...

item.title: Trump’s Oil Tanker Seizure: Another Shocking And Unprecedented Act That Isn’t Shocking Or Unprecedented
item.description: The seizure of a stateless oil tanker carrying Maduro’s oil is aggressive, but it isn’t clearly reckless or an act of 'sleepwalking.'

item.title: Biden officials go silent when asked about Afghan refugee program after guardsmen shooting

item.title: A Health Care Opportunity for Republicans
item.description: Let the enhanced subsidies expire, explain to voters that Obamacare is broken, and advance plans to fix it.

item.title: Anti-Woman Leftists Try To Trans A Beloved Female Game Character
item.description: If leftists really cared about female representation in gaming, they would celebrate Samus Aran rather than try to make her a man.

item.title: Hope in the Face of Antisemitism
item.description: We can’t let evil win.

item.title: Trump says Reiners' 'incurable' opposition to him caused their deaths
item.description: President Trump on Monday said "Trump Derangement Syndrome" led to the deaths of film director Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele.

item.title: Birkin bags can double in value in 5 years. An Hermès expert explains why it’s a better investment than gold
item.description: Thanks to its exclusivity and its status as an investment piece, a Birkin bag’s value is much higher than its sticker price of around $12,000.

item.title: Pope Leo Highlights Divorce Crisis In U.S. Roman Catholic Churches
item.description: The United States accounts for only 6 percent of the world’s Catholics, yet grants 60 percent of the church’s annulments.

item.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court Threatens To Obstruct Immigration Enforcement
item.description: If the state supreme court declares Wisconsin a sanctuary state, the unintended consequences may include more ICE agents in the state.

item.title: Democrats press hard on Epstein files after years of sporadic interest under Biden

item.title: I lead Microsoft’s enterprise AI agent strategy. Here’s what every company should know about how agents will rewrite work
item.description: History shows that breakthrough technologies don’t just slot into existing systems, they make us rethink those systems entirely.

item.title: In Europe, Freedom of the Press Is an Illusion
item.description: If European countries want to tout their supposed press freedom, they should stop pointing to a ranking that confuses censorship with protection.

item.title: House Republicans allege DC police downgraded crime classifications to manipulate statistics
item.description: Congressional report alleges D.C. police chief pressured district commanders to downgrade crime classifications.

item.title: The True Toll of Conspiracy Theories
item.description: I witnessed Charlie Kirk’s murder. Conspiracy theorists are only making this heinous act worse.

item.title: What a Bodega Taught the Socialist
item.description: Zohran Mamdani now says he wants to cut red tape for NYC small businesses. He should apply that epiphany across the board.
